snippet: Ohio is extending its moratorium on capital punishment until at least 2017 because of difficulties obtaining the lethal drugs needed to carry out executions, the state prisons agency said on Monday.
abstract: Ohio suspends executions until at least 2017 because of difficulties obtaining lethal injection drugs.
lead_paragraph: Ohio is extending its moratorium on capital punishment until at least 2017 because of difficulties obtaining the lethal drugs needed to carry out executions, the state prisons agency said on Monday.

headline.main: Unable to Obtain Drugs, Ohio Suspends Executions
headline.print_headline: Unable to Obtain Drugs, Ohio Suspends Executions
